Based on the Java Coding guide, switch statements should have the following indentation:

```java
switch (condition) ``{``
case ABC:
    statements;
    // Fallthrough
case DEF:
    statements;
    break;
case XYZ:
    statements;
    break;
default:
    statements;
    break;
``}``
```

Should be an easy fix for lines 37-76 though! Just Ctrl-Tab the entire contents of the Switch block.
